In SWORD, to create a movement forbidden area (an object) where friend agents cannot enter or move inside it.
The agent moves toward the movement forbidden area to perform. The position reached to perform it is automatically determinated by the agent.
Upon reaching a construction position, the agent constructs instantaneously the object.
At the end of the mission, the movement forbidden area is instantaneously removed.
The friend agents cannot enter or move inside the movement forbidden area.
The mission continues until another mission.
